proof.script:
("" (skosimp)
 (("" (rewrite "bv2nat_inj")
   (("" (expand "bv2int")
     (("" (lift-if)
       (("" (lift-if)
         (("" (ground) (("" (lift-if) (("" (ground) nil nil)) nil))
           nil))
         nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skolem-typepred)
 (("" (expand* "bv2int" "maxint" "minint")
   (("" (lemma "bv2nat_surj")
     (("" (case-replace "iv!1 >= 0")
       (("1" (inst?)
         (("1" (skolem!) (("1" (inst?) (("1" (assert) nil nil)) nil))
           nil)
          ("2" (expand "exp2" +) (("2" (assert) nil nil)) nil))
         nil)
        ("2" (inst - "iv!1 + exp2(N)")
         (("1" (skolem!)
           (("1" (inst?)
             (("1" (lift-if)
               (("1" (ground)
                 (("1" (expand "exp2" -2) (("1" (assert) nil nil))
                   nil))
                 nil))
               nil))
             nil))
           nil)
          ("2" (expand "exp2" +) (("2" (assert) nil nil)) nil))
         nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (expand "bijective?")
 (("" (split)
   (("1" (expand "injective?")
     (("1" (skosimp) (("1" (rewrite "bv2int_inj") nil nil)) nil)) nil)
    ("2" (expand "surjective?")
     (("2" (skolem!) (("2" (rewrite "bv2int_surj") nil nil)) nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skolem!)
 (("" (expand "bv2int")
   (("" (lift-if)
     (("" (use "bv2nat_top_bit")
       (("" (expand "b2n") (("" (ground) nil nil)) nil)) nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skolem!)
 (("" (rewrite "bv2int_lem")
   (("" (use "bv2nat_top_bit")
     (("" (expand "b2n") (("" (ground) nil nil)) nil)) nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (apply-extensionality :hide? t)
 (("" (typepred "int2bv(x!1)")
   (("" (expand "inverse")
     (("" (use "epsilon_ax[bvec[N]]")
       (("" (rewrite "bv2int_inj")
         (("" (inst + "int2bv(x!1)") nil nil)) nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skolem-typepred)
 (("" (use "bv2int_inj")
   (("1" (prop)
     (("1" (hide 2)
       (("1" (rewrite "bv2int_inv")
         (("1" (lift-if)
           (("1" (prop)
             (("1" (expand "bv2int")
               (("1" (rewrite "bv2nat_inv[N]")
                 (("1" (expand "maxint") (("1" (assert) nil nil)) nil))
                 nil))
               nil)
              ("2" (expand "bv2int")
               (("2" (rewrite "bv2nat_inv[N]")
                 (("2" (rewrite "exp2")
                   (("2" (grind :exclude "exp2") nil nil)) nil))
                 nil))
               nil))
             nil))
           nil))
         nil))
       nil))
     nil)
    ("2" (hide 2)
     (("2" (rewrite "exp2") (("2" (grind :exclude "exp2") nil nil))
       nil))
     nil)
    ("3" (hide 2)
     (("3" (rewrite "exp2") (("3" (grind :exclude "exp2") nil nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)
